title.rendered: Petroleum Oil & Lubricant Depot Army jobs in Hafizabad, 2024

content.rendered:
Petroleum Oil & Lubricant Depot Army jobs in Hafizabad, 2024. A job advertisement published in the Express Newspaper, dated August 20, 2024, invites applicants to apply for the post of cook and driver at Petroleum Oil & Lubricant Depot Hafizabad, Hafizabad Punjab, Pakistan. Minimum educational requirements: Middle school, etc.
Government jobs in Petroleum Oil & Lubricant Depot in Army jobs and others can be applied for until 4 October 2024. Learn how to apply for the latest job openings at Petroleum Oil & Lubricant Depot by reading the full ad online. The jobs are at the Pakistan Army department in Hafizabad.

Petroleum Oil & Lubricant Depot Army jobs in Hafizabad, 2024

Date Posted: 22 August, 2024
Sector: Government
Newspaper: Express Jobs
Education: MiddleVacancy
Location: Hafizabad, Punjab, Pakistan
Organization: Petroleum Oil & Lubricant Depot
Industry: Army Jobs
Job Type: Full Time
Job Experience: 2 YearsExpected
Last Date: 04 October, 2024

Latest Job In August 2024

  • Qatar Jobs 2024 New Brand Manpower Management
  • Latest Private Company Peshawar Classified Jobs August 2024
  • Vacancies at Rising Star International Technical Training Center Abu Dhabi 2024
  • Qatar 2024 Pakistan International School Advertisement
  • Abu Dhabi 2024 Essential Manpower Consultant EMC Management Job

Latest Private Jobs in Hafizabad, Punjab, Pakistan August 2024.
Apply Before the last date of this Job. Government Company Job only for Hafizabad, Punjab, Pakistan Full-time jobs in Hafizabad, Punjab, Pakistan as a Government company This ad was shared by Express Jobs
The required Education for this Government company is MiddleVacancy. Minimum Salary starts from 450000 Rs to 55000 Rs Per Month. For More Information please visit the photo ad & visit the official website of Government Company August 2024.

Petroleum Oil & Lubricant Depot Job Application

Please follow the instructions in the job advertisement. Visit https://www.jobz.pk for more information about how to apply online. Beware of fraudulent recruiting activities. Do not pay any money to an employer for any reason, and report it to us via the Contact Us form. Please follow the instructions & dates specified in the official job ad. It is not possible to apply for government jobs online here. Typing errors are possible due to human error except for errors and omissions.
